headline: Motorola Solutions Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: CHICAGO, February 25, 2026--Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: MSI) today announced that its board of directors has approved a regular quarterly dividend of one dollar and twenty-one cents ($1.21) per share. The next quarterly dividend will be payable in cash on April 15, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 20, 2026.

headline: Motorola Solutions Foundation Invests Over $10 Million to Support First Responders and Future Innovators
summary: Global impact driven by strategic grants and record 125,000+ employee volunteer hours NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / February 25, 2026 / The Motorola Solutions Foundation, the charitable and philanthropic arm of Motorola Solutions (NYSE:MSI), ...
